column5: We will be staying in the home the same time as you. We will stay in large master suite and leave remaining 2500 SF to you, which includes four large bedrooms. We will occasionally use kitchen but will stay out of the way for the most part. Our quarter acre backyard features one of the largest and oldest Oak tree. We have a beautiful custom pool and perfectly shaded patio. Just off 1604 freeway. Close to Lackland Airforce Base and Sea World.
column8: Family Oasis (2,500 SF) Near Lackland Sea World
